name: I Wanna Kill The Crappy Memes
name_original: I Wanna Kill The Crappy Memes
description: This game is terrible. So I am sorry if you find yourself playing it. When the game is first loaded you will probably be put right into a level. I didn't fix like finding the problem so just press P and go to the menu. I you do end up playing the game then thank you. Shalom.
